item.description:
Come down and have fun at the fourth annual FPA Pancake Breakfast Fly in.

If you are new the FPA, this is a great event to get to know people. This has turned into a great day where people bring their families down, the kids play in the grassy area, and share flying stories over pancakes!

Last year we had a fun day with a bunch of people flying in and having breakfast. We setup at the picnic area on the runway side of Bullock's hangar.

Pancake Breakfast Cost: $6

Breakfast served from 8:00am to 11:00am

Didn't get a chance to attend last year, see what you missed.

 

VOLUNTEER INFO:

Please let us know in the RSVP questions if you can be part of the SETUP CREW and/or help cook pancakes. Setup Crew should get there at 7:00am.

The last few years have seen a Helicopter and a Stearman show up offering rides to the hardest working volunteers. Who knows what we may attract this year?!? :)
item.how_to_find_us: In the grassy area next to the meeting room

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: FPA Pancake Breakfast Family Fly in
